name: places/ChIJq6p-dIRZwokREga0OXZaQHg
formattedAddress: 157 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 157 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002-1004, USA

originalText.text:
They are not a reputable company do not call them. They promised a $50 fee to diagnose my ice machine. After 30 minutes they said it was fixed and demanded $500 after it dropped one sheet of ice. Since I wasn’t around I told my staff to pay them and was promised a 1 year warranty that the machine will work and that I would be promptly send a receipt. I never got a receipt and immediately after the repairman left the machine stopped working. I was promised they would come back out the next day, then again the next day, then again the next day and now they are ghosting me. Do not trust these people, they will steal your money and do not back up their work as promised.

They have multiple names and addresses listed.

Ice machine repair on google lists them at
157 east Houston street (which does not exist)

Their answering service lists them as “same day local contractors” doing business at 211-11 Atlantic Ave. In Brooklyn. Do not hire them for any project!
